title: Horror Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/5/19
itunes:title: Horror Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/5/19
description:
George Noory and TV horror movie host Mr. Lobo discuss some of their favorite horror movie hosts and actors, and what the future holds for modern horror and science fiction movie franchises.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
